text: "Angeleyes" (also known as "Angel Eyes")Examples include the books The Best of ABBA (Songbook) and The Sound of the Crowd: A Discography of the '80s among others. is a pop song written and recorded in 1978 by the Swedish group ABBA. It is on their sixth studio album, Voulez-Vous. The lyrics and music were written by Benny Andersson and Bj√∂rn Ulvaeus. It is one of ABBA's most popular tracks in the United Kingdom. The song was a successful hit, peaking at No. 3 on the singles chart. ==References== Category:1979 songs Category:ABBA songs
title: Angeleyes
